alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:33PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rutherford, southeastern Williamson, south central Wilson and northwestern Cannon Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 833 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Woodbury, Smyrna, Brentwood, Nolensville, Walterhill, Eagleville, Auburntown, Lascassas, Triune, Rockvale, Milton and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 68 and 87. Interstate 840 between mile markers 33 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
